price: Isaan kafaran (Guyyaa Qiyaamaa) odoo Muslimoota ta’anii baay’ee hawwu!
arabic: رُّبَمَا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡ كَانُواْ مُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: rubamā yawaddu alladhīna kafarū law kānū mus'limīna
